isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CRANKSHAFT AND/OR ENGINE BLOCK (V8), REPLACE

step1.para: Remove engine from vehicle and support engine with stands. Leave lifting device attached.
Remove starter, clutch, flywheel and flywheel housing.
Remove oil level gauge, oil level tube (oil dipstick and dipstick tube), oil pan and oil pick-up tube.
Remove exhaust manifolds.
Support engine on engine stand and remove lifting device.
Remove oil pan. Use special tool to cut oil pan sealant. Remove oil pick-up tube.
Remove air inlet y-pipe (crossover pipe).
Remove turbo to manifold exhaust tubes.
Remove turbo and pedestal assembly.
Remove electronic engine wiring harness; include glow plug relay.
Remove fuel filter assembly and fuel lines.
Remove fuel transfer (tandem pump).
Siphon oil from high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Remove high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Remove high pressure oil pump lines from pump and cylinder heads.
Remove high pressure oil pump gear access cover plate.
Check high pressure oil pump gear backlash. Remove bolt retaining high pressure oil pump gear to pump.
Remove high pressure oil pump. Remove gear.

note.para: Replace gear if backlash exceeds spec.

step1.para: Remove both valve covers.
Remove wiring harness from valve cover gaskets, glow plugs and injectors. Remove valve cover gaskets.
Remove all glow plugs.
Remove all oil director spouts and injectors.
Remove all rocker arms and push rods.

note.para: Mark each location to allow for correct installation.

step1.para: Remove both cylinder heads.
Clean carbon ridge from top of cylinder bore using emery cloth or razor knife. Do not use a ridge reamer.
Remove front engine mount bracket.
Remove camshaft position sensor.
Remove crankshaft damper.
Remove oil pump housing and oil pump assembly.
Remove water pump pulley and water pump.
Remove front cover.
Mark connecting rod locations.
Check camshaft gear-to-crankshaft gear backlash.

note.para: Replace timing gears if backlash exceeds spec.

step1.para: Remove connecting rod cap and, remove all pistons.

note.para: If necessary, replace piston rings at this time.

step1.para: Note location and numbering on main bearing caps. Remove all main bearing caps.
Remove crankshaft using lifting device.
Remove crankshaft main bearings.

para.emph: NOTE: If the cylinder bore is to be honed, the piston cooling jets must be removed to prevent damage to the jets.
NOTE: To replace engine block perform the following steps:

step1.para: Remove piston cooling jets.
Check camshaft end play.

note.para: Replace camshaft thrust plate if end play exceeds spec.

step1.para: Remove camshaft / gear assembly; Include lifters.
Remove oil cooler.
Remove fittings and sensors as needed.
Remove new block from crate and install block to engine stand. Secure damaged block to shipping crate.

para.emph: NOTE: Replace all gaskets and seals. The valve cover gasket may be re-used if it is not damaged.

step1.para: Clean all parts and mating surfaces as needed.

para.emph: NOTE: Perform the following steps if the engine block is being replaced. For the crankshaft, continue at step number 6.

step1.para: Install oil cooler.
Install camshaft / gear assembly. Torque bolts to spec. Install lifters.
Install piston cooling jets. Torque bolts to spec.
Install crankshaft main bearings.
Install crankshaft using lifting device. Time crankshaft with camshaft.
Install crankshaft main bearing caps. Torque bolts to spec.
Install piston assemblies using proper tool. Torque bolts to spec.

note.para: Use special tool, (protector caps) onto connecting rod bolts to prevent damage to crankshaft journals.

step1.para: Install front cover. Torque bolts to spec.
Install oil pick-up tube. Torque bolts to spec.
Install oil pan. Torque bolts to spec.
Install water pump. Torque bolts to spec. Install water pump pulley. Torque bolts to spec.
Remove front crankshaft seal.
Install oil pump and lubricate outer gerotor gear with clean engine oil.

note.para: Observe stamping on oil pump gears for correct installation.

step1.para: Install oil pump housing. Torque bolts to spec.
Install new front crankshaft seal using special tool.
Replace wear ring on damper using special tool. Install damper. Apply RTV to damper washer and torque bolt to spec.
Check camshaft sensor clearance and shim if necessary. Install camshaft position sensor.
Install front engine mount bracket.
Install oil cooler assembly. Install new oil filter.
Replace both intake cover gaskets.
Install new cylinder head gaskets. Install cylinder heads. Tighten bolts in proper sequence and to spec.
Install push rods with copper color ball end up. Install rocker arms and torque bolts to spec.
Replace all injector seals. Install injectors and oil director spouts. Torque bolts to spec.
Apply " never seez " compound to glow plug threads. Install glow plugs. Torque to spec.
Install valve cover gaskets. Install wiring harness to glow plugs, injectors and valve cover gaskets.
Install valve covers. Tighten bolts in proper sequence and to spec.
Insert high pressure oil pump drive gear into opening on top of front cover. Install high pressure oil pump and torque bolts to spec.
Install bolts retaining high pressure oil pump drive gear to pump. Torque bolt to spec.
Apply RTV to high pressure oil pump gear access cover plate. Install cover plate.
Install gasket to top of front cover. Install high pressure oil pump reservoir. Torque bolts to spec.
Install high pressure oil pump lines to pump and cylinder heads.
Install fuel transfer (tandem) pump.
Install fuel filter housing and fuel lines.
Install glow plug relay and electronic engine wiring harness.
Install turbo pedestal and turbo. Torque bolts to spec.
Install air inlet y-pipe (crossover pipe).
Install oil pick-up tube and oil pan. Torque bolts to spec.
Install flywheel housing. Torque bolts to spec.
Install flywheel. Torque bolts to spec.
Install clutch. Tighten bolts in proper sequence and to spec.
Install lifting device to engine. Remove engine from engine stand. Reposition engine on floor, support with stands. Leave lifting device connected to engine.
Install complete turbo and manifold exhaust system. Torque bolts to spec.

note.para: Apply " never seez " compound to exhaust flange bolts prior to assembly.

step1.para: Install oil dipstick tube and stick.
Install fittings and sensors as needed.
Install starter.
Engine is ready to install into vehicle.
